title: Best of The Dan Patrick Show: 02/19/2021
itunes:title: Best of The Dan Patrick Show: 02/19/2021
description:
Jason Smith and Doug Gottlieb sit in for Dan Patrick and explain why they are optimistic for both the Eagles and Colts after completing a trade involving Carson Wentz. The guys talk question how long LeBron James’ can continue to play at such a high level and claim that the Steelers are forcing Ben Roethlisberger into retirement. Colts insider Stephen Holder stops by to explain why Carson Wentz can work in Indianapolis. Plus, Minnesota Vikings running back Dalvin Cook joins teh show to share a major announcement!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Jason Smith and Doug Gottlieb sit in for Dan Patrick and explain why they are optimistic for both the Eagles and Colts after completing a trade involving Carson Wentz. The guys talk question how long LeBron James’ can continue to play at such a high level and claim that the Steelers are forcing Ben Roethlisberger into retirement. Colts insider Stephen Holder stops by to explain why Carson Wentz can work in Indianapolis. Plus, Minnesota Vikings running back Dalvin Cook joins teh show to share a major announcement!
